Set #30403 Olivia’s Remote Control Boat: LEGO changed the look of Olivia for a more diverse group of characters, and this has caused a lot of controversy from many fans of the LEGO Friends line. I’m not entirely sure where I stand on this honestly, but it isn’t as big a deal to me considering most LEGO mini-figures are just plain Yellow characters unless on a licensed theme. So I mean, why are we complaining about the ethnicity of characters made out of ABS Plastic? Hmm, ahem, didn’t mean to sound insensitive there, do forgive me… Let’s cover the set.
Pros:

column2: Pretty decent model despite the parts being rather limited, the model is designed to rotate so you can pretend Olivia is controlling her toy boat remotely and the play feature works perfectly. The micro-model sail boat is a nice build also.
Olivia is sporting a new look with glasses and a different skin tone, the difference is so complete it’s possible to pretend this is another character also named Olivia if you so wish.
Lily pad model added for extra scenery.

column1: Cons:

column2: Model looks great, but is relatively small for a Polybag and does not include as many pieces as past Polybags of this line have used. Additional elements or small models might have aided in bumping up the ratings, especially if LEGO had included something like a stickered or printed box element that Olivia bought from the story to make the remote control boat model.
Olivia looks different and some fans may not appreciate this change.

column1: Overall opinion

Not a bad little Polybag, it’s the cheapest way to get Olivia in her new look for Mini-Doll fans. The play feature works great, but it does limit the look of the model as there aren’t as many things to build in this set. Would have preferred to see a bit more to build. That being said I’d still recommend this set for fans, as it does feature a pretty decent working play feature for the younger fans.
The price is terrible for the parts included and considering you can probably get Olivia in better sets. The playability is weak and the building experience was a flop.
